data.title: Athletics, sports and recreation
data.meta_description: Seventh-day Adventist colleges and universities have sports and intramural programs and recreation facilities ready to facilitate your active lifestyle.
data.text:
Do you kick, swing, run, bike, ski, throw, flip, skate, hike, jump, climb and/or swim? If so, Seventh-day Adventist colleges and universities have athletics, sports and recreation programs and facilities ready to facilitate your active lifestyle.

Sports and Athletics

There are sports events for men and women available at Adventist schools. In addition to intramural sports and intercollegiate sports teams, some colleges even have specific SDA sports traditions that involve the entire campus and the surrounding towns. The Sonnenberg Series of best-of-three basketball games, the Onion Bowl football tournament, and the Newmyer Classic basketball tournament are just a few of the Adventist sports events that attract a crowd each year.

Some schools are positioned near large outdoor recreation areas that host activities like mountain biking, snow skiing, soccer and golf, so you can experience your faith actively against the backdrop of God’s beautiful creation.

Use the following table to see which schools offer intramural sports and intercollegiate teams. This information is accurate at time of posting; follow the links for each schools’ up-to-date information.

Recreational Activities

From mountains to beaches to desert, corn mazes to film studios to White House tours, you’ll find plenty of off-campus recreational activities near Adventist universities and colleges. Whether you enjoy indoor or outdoor activities, or prefer summer, fall, winter or spring fun, there are activities for you to enjoy at each one of our campuses.

Activities on or near SDA college and university campuses:

Walking, hiking and biking trails

Ballet, symphony and opera

Snow boarding, ice skating and snowmobiling

Zoos, wildlife preserves and national parks

Sailing, surfing and wakeboarding

Indoor and outdoor theatres

Snow skiing, tobogganing and snow shoeing

City parks, playgrounds and pools

Fishing, hunting and camping

Gallerias, shopping malls and outlet stores

Horseback riding and rodeos

Cultural centers and sight-seeing tours

Boating, scuba diving and kite boarding

Rock climbing, spelunking and bird-watching

Planetariums, botanical gardens and nature centers

Kayaking, rafting and canoeing

World cuisine and fine-dining restaurants

BMX racing, disc golf and skateboarding

Aquariums, riverboat cruises and vineyard tours

Complement your faith-charged education through participation in a wide variety of athletics, sports and recreation activities at SDA colleges and universities.
